questionListItems.title: How do I sign up to use WizGov for my agency's website?

answer.body: WizGov is currently in its pilot phase and only onboarding agencies upon request.While our team is still working on making the widget creation process completely self-serve,  you can contact us at https://go.gov.sg/wizgov-contact-us-form so we can help create widgets for you at the moment!
WizGov is a product that allows public officers to easily create widgets of commonly used OGP tools like AskGov to integrate into their website.

questionListItems.title: What type of widgets can I create on WizGov?

answer.body: At the moment, you can only create an AskGov widget for your agency's website. Having said this, we are exploring the creation of widgets of other OGP products like FormSG, PaySG, PairSG, etc. in the future. Please get in touch with our team to share more about your requirements if you are interested!

questionListItems.title: What type of websites can I add WizGov widgets to?

answer.body: You can add our widget to any type of agency website you wish to, be it an Isomer site, CWP site, SharePoint site, etc. Having said this, the process of adding a widget will differ across these websites. Please contact our team to assist you with this process.

questionListItems.title: I'm interested to create an AskGov widget to embed into my agency's website. How do I go about this?

answer.body: Our team is still working on making the widget creation process completely self-serve. For the moment, please contact us at https://go.gov.sg/wizgov-contact-us-form so we can help create an AskGov widget for you! If you have yet to onboard AskGov, please email the team at askgov@open.gov.sg to assist further with this and keep us in the loop at wizgov@open.gov.sg to assist you further. Thank you!

questionListItems.title: The WizGov widget does not seem to be working properly. Where can I get help to fix/troubleshoot this?

answer.body: Please contact our team at wizgov@open.gov.sg so that we are able to assist you further!

questionListItems.title: Do I need to pay to use WizGov?

answer.body: No, WizGov is completely free to use!

questionListItems.title: Do I need to know how to code to use WizGov?

answer.body: No, please contact our team to assist with embedding WizGov widgets to your website!
